Title: Prohibits prior peace officers or police officers whose position as such was terminated or vacated due to misconduct from again becoming a peace officer or a police officer
Summary: Prohibits prior peace officers or police officers whose position as such was terminated or vacated due to misconduct from again becoming a peace officer or a police officer.
LawCode: Ren ยง837-w to be ยง837-x, add ยง837-y, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting prior peace officers or police officers whose position as such was terminated or vacated due to misconduct from again becoming a peace officer or a police officer
